Package com.soprabanking.ips.controllers

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    CommentController
    Comments Controller This is a controller class for comments to be seen on proposals.
    FeedController
    Feed Controller This is a controller class to show the different Feed streams on the Landing page.
    ForgotPasswordController
    ForgotPassword Controller Provides Rest-APIs for forgot password and reset password.
    HomeController
    Home Controller Provides Rest-APIs for user registration and login.
    ProposalController
    Proposal Controller This is a controller class for proposals which will be seen on different feeds.
    TeamController
    Team Controller This is a controller class for all the teams that are in the system.It has the getAllTeams method.
    UpvotesController
    Upvotes Controller This is a controller class for upvotes done on proposals.
    UserController
    User Controller Provides Rest-APIs for logging in through social media .
